      public void addCurrency(Currency currency)
      Used to add a currency.
      Parameters:
      currency - The currency to add.

    • defaultCurrency

      @NotNull public @NotNull Currency defaultCurrency()
      Used to get the default currency. This could be the default currency for the server globally or for the default world if the implementation supports multi-world.
      Returns:
      The currency that is the default for the server if multi-world support is not available otherwise the default for the default world.
      Since:
      0.1.2.0

    • defaultCurrency

      @NotNull public @NotNull Currency defaultCurrency(@NotNull @NotNull String region)
      Used to get the default currency for the specified world if this implementation has multi-world support, otherwise the default currency for the server.
      Parameters:
      region - The region to get the default currency for. This could be a world, biomes, or a third party based region.
      Returns:
      The default currency for the specified world if this implementation has multi-world support, otherwise the default currency for the server.
      Since:
      0.1.2.0

    • getCurrencies

      public Collection<Currency> getCurrencies(@NotNull @NotNull String region)
      Used to get a set of every Currency object that is available in the specified world if this implementation has multi-world support, otherwise all Currency objects for the server.
      Parameters:
      region - The region to get the currencies for. This could be a world, biomes, or a third party based region.
      Returns:
      A set of every Currency object that is available in the specified world if this implementation has multi-world support, otherwise all Currency objects for the server.
      Since:
      0.1.2.0

    • find

      public Optional<Currency> find(UUID identifier)
      Used to find a currency based on its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier to look for.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the currency if it exists, otherwise an empty Optional.

    • findByItem

      public Optional<Currency> findByItem(net.tnemc.item.AbstractItemStack<?> item)
      Used to find a currency based on an item.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to use for this search.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the currency if this item is a valid currency item, otherwise an empty Optional.

    • findCurrencyByMaterial

      public Optional<Currency> findCurrencyByMaterial(String material)
      Used to find a currency based on a material.
      Parameters:
      material - The material to use for this search.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the currency if this item is a valid currency item, otherwise an empty Optional.

    • findCurrencyBySymbol

      public Optional<Currency> findCurrencyBySymbol(@Nullable @Nullable String symbol)
      Finds a Currency object based on the symbol provided.
      Parameters:
      symbol - The symbol of the currency to search for.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the Currency object if found, otherwise an empty Optional.

    • find

      public Optional<Currency> find(String identifier)
      Used to find a currency based on its user-friendly identifier.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier to look for.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the currency if it exists, otherwise an empty Optional.

    • findOrDefault

      public Currency findOrDefault(String identifier)
      Used to find a currency based on its user-friendly identifier.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier to look for.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the currency if it exists, otherwise an empty Optional.

    • findOrDefault

      public Currency findOrDefault(UUID identifier)
      Used to find a currency based on its identifier, or a new Currency object if the specified identifier doesn't exist.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier to look for.
      Returns:
      The currency object if found; Otherwise a new currency object.

    • findOrDefault

      public Currency findOrDefault(UUID identifier, boolean item)
      Used to find a currency based on its identifier, or a new Currency object if the specified identifier doesn't exist.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier to look for.
      item - True if this should return an ItemCurrency object if the specified identifier doesn't exist.
      Returns:
      The currency object if found; Otherwise a new currency object.
